definition[0]: a small amount or piece that is taken from something, so that it can be tested or examined
definition[1]: a single example of something, often an animal or plant
example[2]: a very fine specimen of 12th-century glass
definition[2]: a person you are describing in a particular way â€“ used humorously
example[3]: Her boyfriend is an impressive physical specimen.
definition[3]: provided as a typical example of something
example[5]: When you open an account with us you will be asked to provide a specimen signature.
